events.message: Customer reported a car collision that occurred on a rainy day involving another vehicle at an intersection.
Claim was categorised under Auto Accident after reviewing the initial report and verifying keywords related to the incident.
An insurance agent was assigned to the case to facilitate the claim process and communicate with the claimant.
Acknowledgment of the claim was sent to the customer, confirming receipt and initiation of the evaluation process.
Additional documents such as the police report, photos of the vehicle damage, and driver's license were requested.
Customer promptly submitted all requested documents including detailed images and the official police collision report.
The investigation team began reviewing the evidence and assessing the extent of damage to the vehicle involved.
Investigation concluded with confirmation of fault liability and validation of submitted evidence by the authorities.
A settlement offer covering vehicle repairs and third-party damages was proposed to the claimant for approval.
Customer responded positively to the proposed settlement and expressed satisfaction with the communication and support.
The claim was officially approved based on the agreed settlement and documentation completeness.
Payment for repairs and damages was successfully processed and credited to the customer's account promptly.
The claim case was formally closed after final confirmation of payment receipt and customer contentment.
